title: Radio Gaga (abridged)
lyrics:
[intro]
| (E) | (E) | (F#m) | (F#m) |
| (A) | (A) | (F#m) | (A) (E) | (E) |
| (E) | (E) | (F#m) | (F#m) |
| (A) | (A) | (F#m) | (A) (E) | (A) (E) |
 :
I’d (E)sit alone, and watch your light
My (F#m)only friend, through teenage nights
And (A)everything, I had to know
I (F#m)heard it on my (A)radi-(E)o (E)
 
You (E)gave them all, those old-time stars
Through (F#m)wars of worlds, invaded by Mars
You (A)made ’em laugh, you made ’em cry
You (F#m)made us feel, like (A)we could (E)fly
(A)Radi-(E)o
 
[pre-chorus]
So (E)don’t become, some background noise            
A (A9)backdrop for, the girls and boys
Who (A)just don’t know, or just don’t care
And (A#dim7)just complain when you’re not there
You (E)had your time, you had the power
You’ve (B)yet to have, your finest hour
(A)Radi-(E)o, (A)radi-(E)o
 
[chorus]
(E)All we hear is “(A)Radio (E)ga ga
(A)Radio (E)goo goo, (A)radio (E)ga ga”
(E)All we hear is “(A)Radio (E)ga ga
(A)“Radio (E)blah blah.” (D)radio, what’s (A-)new? (-B)
(C#m)Radio, (B)some-(B)one (A)still (B)loves (E)you!
 
We (E)watch the shows, we watch the stars
On (F#m)videos, for hours and hours
We (A)hardly need, to use our ears
How (F#m)music changes (A)through the (E)years (E)
 
[pre-chorus]
Let’s (E)hope you never, leave old friend
Like (A9)all good things, on you we depend         
So (A)stick around, ’cause we might miss you
When (A#dim7)we grow tired, of all this visual
You (E)had your time, you had the power
You’ve (B)yet to have, your finest hour
(A)Radi-(E)o, (A)radi-(E)o
 
[chorus, clap]
(N.C.)All we hear is “Radio ga ga, Radio goo goo, Radio ga ga”
(N.C.)All we hear is “Radio ga ga, Radio goo goo, Radio ga ga”
(E)All we hear is “(A)Radio (E)ga ga
(A)“Radio (E)blah blah.” (D)radio, what’s (A-)new? (-B)
(C#m)Some-(B)one (A)still (B)loves (E)you!
 
[outro]
| (E) | (A9) | (A9) |
| (A) | (A) | (A#dim7) | (A#dim7) |
| (A) (E) | (A) (E) | (E) [end]
